ygData.subject: Patch day...
ygData.msgSnippet: Couple shots in the arm today if you didnt notice. Read first on EQvault but copied from http://eq.castersrealm.com/ :)  Personally I find most interesting the
ygData.messageBody:
Couple shots in the arm today if you didnt notice. Read first on EQvault but
copied from http://eq.castersrealm.com/ :) Personally I find most
interesting the change to 'DDD'. It shall be interesting to see if this
spell makes its way back into peoples hotkey bank... imho it seems like more
of a PvP spell now (mana drain on Mobs? whats the point?)

yup nothing 'nerfed' though, unless you were really attatched to 'sense
magic'

Cogg

- Mana costs for enchanting metals has been reduced.
- Dyn's Dizzying Draught has been altered slightly. It now reduces AC,
Agility, and drains mana as well as spinning the target.
- Blanket of Forgetfullness has received a minor upgrade.
- "Reoccurring Amnesia" has had its casting time reduced.
- "Yaulp" and "Augmentation" should now stack.
- "Sense Magic" has been replaced in all cases by the "True North" spell. If
you have already inscribed the "Sense Magic" spell, the spell icon will now
automatically reflect "True North".
